snippet: The Alhurra network said  one of its cameramen was strip-searched by Israeli security while covering a Fourth of July party at the American ambassador’s residence.
abstract: American-financed Arab-coordinated Alhurra network says one of its cameramen was interrogated and strip-searched by Israeli security officers while covering Fourth of July party at American ambassador's residence near Tel Aviv; Arab satellite channel had coordinated with prime minister's office to cover event on behalf of international news media.
lead_paragraph: The Alhurra network said  one of its cameramen was strip-searched by Israeli security while covering a Fourth of July party at the American ambassador’s residence.

headline.main: Israel: Cameraman Held at U.S. Party
headline.print_headline: Israel: Cameraman Held at U.S. Party
